ending.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the way that a story, film, activity etc finishes
ending.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a story with a happy ending
Coffee is the perfect ending to a meal.
ending.translation[0].definitions[1].def: when a process stops or is finished, or when you finish it
ending.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: the first elections since the ending of the dictatorship
ending.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the last part of a word
